/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, painting a picture of a cityscape under a blanket of clouds.
